thread.title: Canada-Germany bobsleigh tie a 'beautiful thing' say Canadian athletes

title: Canada-Germany bobsleigh tie a 'beautiful thing' say Canadian athletes
text:
Canada-Germany bobsleigh tie a 'beautiful thing' say Canadian athletes 10:12am GMT - 01:30 
Canada's bobsleigh team of Justin Kripps and Alexander Kopacz say they are 'honoured' to share gold with the German team of Francesco Friedrich and Thorsten Margis ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Canada's bobsleigh team of Justin Kripps and Alexander Kopacz say they are 'honoured' to share gold with the German team of Francesco Friedrich and Thorsten Margis Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2ET94TQ
